name: Flipkart Flash Sale Phishing
description: Scammer sends a phishing email impersonating Flipkart's Big Billion Day sale with an unbelievable deal on Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, directing victims to a fake checkout page.

turns.scammer_message: EXCLUSIVE: Flipkart Big Billion Day Early Access! Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra at Rs 4,999. Only 50 units left! Claim now: http://flipkart-bigsale.deals/s24ultra
turns.notes: Initial phishing bait with fake Flipkart sale link and extreme discount to lure victims.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for your interest in the Big Billion Day Early Access deal! To ensure smooth delivery, please complete your order at http://flipkart-bigsale.deals/s24ultra within the next 15 minutes. Only 23 units are still available.
turns.notes: Scammer resends phishing link with decreasing stock count to create FOMO.

turns.scammer_message: We understand if you have questions about this exclusive offer. This is a genuine Flipkart promotion for our top customers. You can verify by contacting our dedicated support team at support@flipkart-bigbillion.shop. We are happy to assist you with the purchase process.
turns.notes: Scammer provides fake support email to appear legitimate and build trust.

turns.scammer_message: STOCK UPDATE: Only 8 units of Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra remain at Rs 4,999. Several customers are checking out right now. If you face any payment issues, write to support@flipkart-bigbillion.shop and our team will generate a direct payment link for you.
turns.notes: Scammer repeats email address and creates artificial scarcity to pressure the victim.

turns.scammer_message: FINAL NOTICE: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra deal at Rs 4,999 is SOLD OUT in 2 minutes. This is your absolute last chance. Click http://flipkart-bigsale.deals/s24ultra NOW or lose this deal forever. Flipkart Big Billion Day won't come again for another year!
turns.notes: Final turn with maximum urgency, resending phishing link one last time.
